title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wreaks havoc on Gotham City, forcing Batman to confront his own moral limits and the chaos that challenges justice and order.

title: Stranger Things
description: In the quiet town of Hawkins, a group of kids uncover a series of supernatural mysteries, including a girl with psychokinetic abilities and a terrifying parallel dimension called the Upside Down.

title: Breaking Bad
description: High school chemistry teacher Walter White turns to producing methamphetamine after a terminal cancer diagnosis, descending into a dark world of crime, power struggles, and moral corruption.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the remaining Avengers unite to reverse Thanos’ destruction, embarking on a time-traveling quest filled with epic battles, emotional stakes, and heroic sacrifices.

title: Game of Thrones
description: In the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, noble families vie for power, while an ancient threat returns from beyond the Wall. Intrigue, betrayal, and warfare shape the fate of the realm.

title: Joker
description: Arthur Fleck, a struggling comedian in Gotham City, faces social rejection, mental illness, and a cruel society, ultimately descending into madness to become the infamous criminal known as the Joker.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
description: A modern adaptation of Shakespeare’s 'The Taming of the Shrew' where a new student schemes to date the fiery Kat Stratford.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Young Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts, where he begins to uncover the secrets of his past.

title: La Casa de Papel (Money Heist)
description: A criminal mastermind gathers a team to pull off the biggest heist in Spain’s history, targeting the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Frozen
description: Princess Elsa possesses magical ice powers and accidentally traps her kingdom in eternal winter, forcing her sister Anna to set things right.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: Belle, a bright young woman, discovers love and courage when she meets the mysterious Beast who holds a magical secret.

title: The Lion King
description: Simba, a young lion prince, must embrace his destiny and reclaim his throne after the murder of his father by his uncle Scar.

title: Aladdin
description: Aladdin discovers a magical lamp and teams up with a spirited genie to win the heart of Princess Jasmine while thwarting a power-hungry sorcerer.
